export for I20050405-0800
*** Bug 90655 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Problem showing up in the Ant editor as well.
Not sure if related but please note 90763 where I could come up with a 
reproduceable test case.

Found a test case:
In an Ant editor type c
Ctrl space
type ss

Blows up every time.

(In reply to comment #5)
> Found a test case:

Nice, thanks.

Can still not reproduce on GTK, assuming a Win32-specific problem with the
SetData callback.

Fixed > 20050408 by guarding the array access with a range check. We should
still investigate what is causing this.
*** Bug 90850 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
